summary: A mischievous teen wants to teach a lesson to a man by making his daughter his girlfriend.
cast: Prathamesh Parab|Ketaki Mategaonkar|Vaibhav Mangale|Meghna Erande|Urmila Kanitkar|Bhushan Pradhan|Manmeet Pem|Onkar Raut|Jayesh Chandrakant Chavan|Aarti Wadagbalkar|Anvita Phaltankar|Aadesh Bandekar|Ramchandra Dhumal|Bhau Kadam|Supriya Pathare|Uday Sabnis|Rohit Shilwant
title: Time Pass
